data.title: FH Joanneum: Tuition, Admissions, Rankings
data.text:
FH Joanneum is a public university in Graz, Austria. It also has campuses in Kapfenberg and Bad Gleichenberg. It was founded in 1995. The university offers nearly 70 undergraduate and postgraduate degree programs in fields such as business, technology, design, media, architecture, health, and social services. There are also new programs, such as midwifery education, that have not previously been offered in Austria.

FH Joanneum Overview

Master's Tuition Fees

Although this range provide a good estimate of tuition costs at FH Joanneum, the actual fees depend on your chosen program. Thus, for more exact figures, you may refer to FH Joanneum tuition fee pages.

Ready to save in tuition and study in Austria? Click here to read our guides to tuition fees and cheapest universities in Austria and start planning your dream education today.

Admissions At FH Joanneum

If you wish to study at FH Joanneum, you’ll need to know the admission process, requirements, and other relevant information. Those may vary based on the program you’re applying to FH Joanneum.

Moreover, the process and requirements for FH Joanneum international admission may differ from domestic admission. Thus, if you’re an international student, check what additional requirements you need to submit and how you can validate your academic credentials.

To help you find all the admission-related information, we’ve compiled the bachelor's and master's admission pages of FH Joanneum. Select which one applies to you and take note of the process and requirements.

Degree Admission Pages Bachelor's International Admissions Page Master's International Admissions Page

Planning to study in Austria?

From choosing your university to applying for your student visa, we know that studying abroad is not easy. However, we are here to support you every step of the way! Don't forget to explore our comprehensive guide as you prepare for your educational journey in Austria.
